name: @fairmanager/strider-docker-slave
description: Runs inside of a docker container, running commands, communicating via JSON

scripts.docker:build: bash -c "docker build --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\"` --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --tag fairmanager/strider-docker-slave:latest ."
scripts.docker:tag: bash -c "docker tag fairmanager/strider-docker-slave:latest fairmanager/strider-docker-slave:$npm_package_version && docker tag fairmanager/strider-docker-slave:latest fairmanager/strider-docker-slave:latest"

author: Oliver Salzburg <oliver.salzburg@gmail.com>
